meanings.definition: Twasomes: a group of two people or things
meanings.sent1: The twasomes sat together on the bench.
meanings.sent2: I saw a twasomes of birds perched on the tree branch.
meanings.sent3: The twasomes of socks were always missing one from the pair.
meanings.sent4: The twasomes of stars shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The twasomes of kittens played joyfully in the yard.

meanings.definition: Twasomes: to be in a pair or duo
meanings.sent1: They twasomes to the party, hand in hand.
meanings.sent2: We twasomes down the street, laughing all the way.
meanings.sent3: The shoes twasomes in the closet, neatly arranged.
meanings.sent4: Their voices twasomes in harmony during the performance.
